page.title: 07DENBIGH WILDLIFE SURVEY.
page.content: Due to newspaper,radio and T.V. reports, there is a feeling that people are becoming more aware of the need to conserve wild animals and plants.A{Conservation Survey}was carried out in order to gauge the reaction of local people to the apparent concern for nature.We interviewed one hundred people in the town of{Denbigh}on the afternoon of Friday May 17th 1985.The results were as follows: {1.}Do you take an interest in: ANIMALS PLANTS BOTH NEITHER? {25% 13% 52% 10% {2.} Do you think wildlife is in danger in this country? YES NO {77% 23% {3.} If so from what? {ACCEPTABLE ANSWERS DON'T KNOW {hunting,pollution etc 31% {69%}
